data.text: Jehoshaphat guu pono di lohongo king dono damana, gu hagamaaloo aga nia mogobuna dono waawa hai baahi gi Israel.
Mee gu haganoho ana gau dauwa i lodo nia waahale abaaba o Judah, i lodo nia gowaa o Judah i daha mo nia waahale, mo i lodo nia waahale ala ne kumi go Asa i lodo tenua go Ephraim.
Dimaadua gu hagahumalia Jehoshaphat idimaa mee e daudali nia hangaahai o dono damana dono madagoaa nogo dama daane, gei hagalee nogo daumaha gi Baal.
Mee gu hai hegau gi di God o dono damana, gu daudali nia haganoho a God, gei mee hagalee daudali di mouli o nia king o Israel.
Dimaadua guu wanga gi Jehoshaphat di mogobuna maaloo e dagi tenua go Judah, gei nia daangada huogodoo e gaamai gi mee nadau kisakis, gei mee gu maluagina, gu hagalaamua go digaula.
Mee gu hagalaamua dana hagagila aga Dimaadua, gu oho gi daha nia gowaa balu daumaha huogodoo mo nia ada o di god Asherah i lodo Judah.
I lodo tolu ngadau nogo king, mee gu hagau gi daha digau aamua aanei e agoago i lodo nia waahale o Judah: Benhail, Obadiah, Zechariah, Nethanel, mo Micaiah.

Digaula ne hula ginaadou mo digau Levi dogo hiwa ge dogo lua daangada hai mee dabu. Digau Levi la go Shemaiah, Nethaniah, Zebadiah, Asahel, Shemiramoth, Jehonathan, Adonijah, Tobijah, mo Tobadonijah; nia daangada hai mee dabu la go Elishama mo Jehoram.
Digaula guu kae di beebaa Nnaganoho Dimaadua, guu hula laa lodo nia waahale huogodoo o Judah, e agoago gi nia daangada nia mee ala i lodo di beebaa deelaa.
Dimaadua guu hai nia henua llauehe huogodoo ala e haganiga tenua di King Jehoshaphat gi mmaadagu di hula e dauwa gi mee.

Hunu daangada o Philistia gu gaamai nadau hagabae silber logowaahee mo nia kisakis ala i golo gi Jehoshaphat, mo hunu daangada o Arabia gu gaamai labelaa nadau siibi e hidu mana ge hidu lau (7,700) mono kuudi e hidu mana ge hidu lau (7,700) gi mee.
Deenei di mogobuna o Jehoshaphat e tomo gi nua i nia madagoaa huogodoo. Mee gu hagaduu ana abaaba waahale, ge guu hau ana waahale laa lodo Judah hagatau,
ala nia gowaa e benebene ai nia goloo e logowaahee.
e hagatau gi nadau madahaanau. Adnah la di tagi aamua o nia buini dauwa mai nia madahaanau o Judah, e dagi ana gau dauwa dogo dolu lau mana (300,000).
Togolua dagi la go Jehohanan, e dagi ana gau dauwa dogo lualau mo huwowalu mana (280,000).
Togodolu dagi la go Amasiah tama daane a Zichri e dagi ana gau dauwa dogo lua lau mana (200,000). (Amasiah guu bida hiihai bolo e hai nnegau Dimaadua.)

Tagi aamua o nia buini dauwa o nia madahaanau o Benjamin la go Eliada, taane dauwa e aali huoloo, e dagi ana gau dauwa dogo lua lau mana (200,000) guu hau ginaadou gi nia duuli abaaba dangada mo nia maalei.
Dono togolua dagi la go Jehozabad e dagi ana gau dauwa e lau mo huwowalu mana (180,000), guu hau gu togomaalia humalia gi tauwa.
Nia daane aanei gu ngalua gi di king i Jerusalem, e hagapuni labelaa, mee gu haganoho labelaa ana gau dauwa gi lodo nia waahale o Judah ala gu abaaba.
